channel.title: [525] Mast3r-Pkyz 525 Release! [Chaotic rapier, maul, Overloads, Cks [525]
channel.description:
[b]Hello Moparscapions, Mast3r-pkyz 525 here to release the source & Client. I've had an Flawless time coding 525's so use this source wisely and don't leech:P THIS IS MY FIRST RELEASE.
Source: http://uppit.com/6n8f6leinams/Mast3r-Pkyz.rar Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?mm1l4fbq7d5t081
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2461lc6.png[/img] • Overloads • Chaotic items • Dungeoneering items • ALOT of usefull commands added. • turmoil, soul split, Leeches (the basics) • Everything a 525 should have
[size=14pt]Client features:[/size] •ROCKTAIL CODE - 391, 392 NOTED. •ADDED CHAOTIC SHIELD •ROYAL CROWN ADDED. •ROYAL LEGS. •ROYAL TOP. •ROYAL STAFF. •NEW CLIENT SPRITES •ADDED CAVE FISH - •FIXED STAFF OF LIGHT STANCE! •ADDED CLIENT BACKGROUND >:D - BACKGROUND CREDITS TO Bob for making it. •ADDED new rs tab interface •Staff of light - 6908 with perfect stance. •New runescape inventory tabs added. •Added soulwars cape (blue). •Added Primal armour, Promethium armour, Zephyrium armour. •Added primal 2h, zephy maul, chaotic rapier, chaotic rapier, chaotic longsword •Added Eagle-eye shield & Alot more features. Client will be uploaded tomorrow!
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/ygw2p.png[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/15g410g.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/wtzy0y.gif[/img] I'll Add more pictures tomorrow/when i have the time, since im sleepy atm.
Links: Source: http://uppit.com/6n8f6leinams/Mast3r-Pkyz.rar Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?mm1l4fbq7d5t081
If you want the insanepkz thing to be removed, pm me and i will give you custom sprites that don't have insanepkz on it.
Ok guys, Since this turned out good. I may make a Mast3r-pkyz v2, But with a client to meet your needs, sprites that you want, models and items you request. also i will try to add anything you want in a source and send you it, or package one for everyone. Please request what you WOULD like in v2, and i'll get to work as soon as possible, thanks. -
Credits - 15% for base, Can't remember who's. 75% socceroos11 - Coding Alot. 6% Mr lol - Alot of help gathering sprites & Models. 4% Bob - Epic guy, Cool gfxer.
Please give credits if you use this, And dont hate.[/b]

item.dc:creator: @socceroos11 socceroos11
item.description:
@socceroos11 wrote:

[b]Hello Moparscapions, Mast3r-pkyz 525 here to release the source & Client. I’ve had an Flawless time coding 525’s so use this source wisely and don’t leech:P
THIS IS MY FIRST RELEASE.

Source: http://uppit.com/6n8f6leinams/Mast3r-Pkyz.rar
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?mm1l4fbq7d5t081


• Overloads
• Chaotic items
• Dungeoneering items
• ALOT of usefull commands added.
• turmoil, soul split, Leeches (the basics)
• Everything a 525 should have

[size=14pt]Client features:[/size]
•ROCKTAIL CODE - 391, 392 NOTED.
•ADDED CHAOTIC SHIELD
•ROYAL CROWN ADDED.
•ROYAL LEGS.
•ROYAL TOP.
•ROYAL STAFF.
•NEW CLIENT SPRITES
•ADDED CAVE FISH -
•FIXED STAFF OF LIGHT STANCE!
•ADDED CLIENT BACKGROUND >:D - BACKGROUND CREDITS TO Bob for making it.
•ADDED new rs tab interface
•Staff of light - 6908 with perfect stance.
•New runescape inventory tabs added.
•Added soulwars cape (blue).
•Added Primal armour, Promethium armour, Zephyrium armour.
•Added primal 2h, zephy maul, chaotic rapier, chaotic rapier, chaotic longsword
•Added Eagle-eye shield & Alot more features.
Client will be uploaded tomorrow!


15g410g.gif765×503

wtzy0y.gif765×503

I’ll Add more pictures tomorrow/when i have the time, since im sleepy atm.

Links:
Source: http://uppit.com/6n8f6leinams/Mast3r-Pkyz.rar
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?mm1l4fbq7d5t081

If you want the insanepkz thing to be removed, pm me and i will give you custom sprites that don’t have insanepkz on it.

Ok guys, Since this turned out good. I may make a Mast3r-pkyz v2, But with a client to meet your needs, sprites that you want, models and items you request. also i will try to add anything you want in a source and send you it, or package one for everyone. Please request what you WOULD like in v2, and i’ll get to work as soon as possible, thanks. -

Credits -
15% for base, Can’t remember who’s.
75% socceroos11 - Coding Alot.
6% Mr lol - Alot of help gathering sprites & Models.
4% Bob - Epic guy, Cool gfxer.

Please give credits if you use this, And dont hate.[/b]
